name: Learning
description: Your seat of learning (e.g. school, university).

name: Hometown
description: Your hometown (e.g. rural village, market town, busy city).

name: First Love
description: The place you met your first love (e.g. a music concert, on holiday, a bomb shelter).

name: Contemplation
description: A place for quiet contemplation (e.g. the library, country walks on your estate, fishing).

name: Social
description: A place for socializing (e.g. gentlemen's club, local bar, uncle's house).

name: Belief
description: A place connected with your ideology/belief (e.g. parish church, Mecca, Stonehenge).

name: Grave
description: The grave of a significant person. Who? (e.g. a parent, a child, a lover).

name: Home
description: Your family home (e.g. a country estate, a rented flat, the orphanage in which you were raised).

name: Happy Place
description: The place you were happiest in your life (e.g. the park bench where you first kissed, your university).

name: Workplace
description: Your workplace (e.g. the office, library, bank).
